oai_dc:dc.dc:title: ON THE CONTROLLABILITY OF PREDATOR-PREY SYSTEMS
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: JOSHI, MC
GEORGE, RK
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: controllability
predator-prey systems
dynamic systems
fixed-point theorems
contraction mapping principle
functional analysis
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: In this paper, we obtain both global and local controllability results for a general nonautonomous predator-prey system using some techniques of nonlinear functional analysis such as the Schauder fixed-point theorem and contraction mapping principle.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF OPTIMIZATION THEORY AND APPLICATIONS, 74(2), 243-258
